summary:
Tweaks and Customization:
1) Fertigo Pro is used as the default font (no clipping issue).
2) Monotype Corsiva is used for Handwritten papers.
3) Books and all other scripts use default Skyrim fonts.
descriptionHtml:
This font package is a cleaner and simplified combination of:
Main Font Replacement - Fertigo Pro by Valistar V2.0
Fhaarkas Font Replacement by Fhaarkas V3.3

Tweaks and Customization by Arjestin:
1) Fertigo Pro is used as the default font in all menus and dialogues.
2) Monotype Corsiva is used for Handwritten papers.
3) Books and all other scripts use default Skyrim fonts.



Version 1.1 Changelog:
1) Keeps the original Translate_ENGLISH.txt - No need to backup this file.
2) Current location marker is back on the map.
3) Fertigo Pro clipping issues in Save/Load Menus and the map are gone.

Version 1.2 for SkyUI Changelog:
1) Save Names are enlarged on mouseover without causing any clipping issues.



SkyUI users:
Please install the Arjestin Font Replacement for SkyUI.
1) Prevents clipping issues in Save/Load Menus.
2) Restores general stats Value to Right alignment.

For more information read fontconfig.txt
Note: Clipping issues might still occur if using language pack.



Credits:
1) Bethesda
2) Valistar
3) Fhaarkas
4) Font Authors





Have fun and enjoy my mod.
   Arjestin.
author: Arjestin

files.name: Arjestin Font Replacement for SkyUI
